name: Off (itch) (PIPpE)
description: well, this game is for the scratch jam, the theme is "connected" so, the game is about a blackout... the city is dark and also NOBODY :0 can do their works or some hobbies, so you need to collect all the electrical outlets of the city to connect the peaple another time!! this proyect is made by PIPpE, a 12 years old kid
